patthana16.63:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:1.1_2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:2.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.63:2.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
